# format:
# <spk-id>: <dot>,<ch>: <neighbour-id1>[,<neighbour-id2>...] [:<exit-point>]
# note: edges are always bi-directional, there is no need to specify them twice
#
# mittlerer arm
238: 22, 6: 236, 237 : 0 # bienenkorb
237: 22, 5: 236, 238
236: 22, 4: 235, 237, 238
235: 17, 7: 233, 234, 236
234: 17, 8: 232, 233, 235
233: 17, 9: 232, 234, 235
232: 17,10: 231, 233, 234
231: 17,11: 229, 230, 232
230: 17,12: 228, 229, 231
229: 18, 7: 228, 230, 231
228: 18, 8: 226, 229, 230
227: 18, 9: 217, 225, 226
226: 18,10: 225, 227, 228
225: 18,11: 224, 226, 227
224: 18,12: 217, 225
223: 12, 1: 222 : 3 # cul-de-sac
222: 12, 2: 219, 221, 223
221: 12, 3: 214, 219, 220, 222
220: 12, 4: 214, 221
219: 12, 5: 218, 221, 222
218: 12, 6: 212, 213, 219
217: 12, 7: 215, 216, 224, 227
216: 12, 8: 214, 217
215: 12, 9: 212, 214, 217
214: 12,10: 215, 216, 220, 210
213: 12,11: 212, 218
212: 12,12: 211, 213, 215, 218
211: 18, 1: 207, 210, 212
210: 18, 2: 207, 209, 211
209: 18, 3: 204, 208, 210
208: 18, 4: 207, 209
207: 18, 5: 205, 206, 208, 210, 211
206: 18, 6: 204, 205, 207
205: 17, 1: 203, 204, 206, 207
204: 17, 2: 203, 205, 206, 209
203: 17, 3: 201, 202, 204, 205
202: 17, 4: 201, 203
201: 17, 5: 202, 203 : 2 # exit = TEST
